data.name: CodeCrafts Vienna
data.description: CodeCrafts is a community-driven conference all about crafting exceptional software. A unique inclusive event where passionate Software Engineers, Local Heroes, and International Thought Leaders come together in the heart of Vienna to grow and influence your mindset and technical expertise.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Bootcamp Austria 2020
relatedRecords.description: All around the world user groups and communities will come together from April 23 - April 25, 2020 once again in the seventh Global Azure Bootcamp event. Join us on Friday, April 24, 2020 in Linz.

relatedRecords.name: IT-Tage
relatedRecords.description: Die IT-Tage 2019 finden vom 09. bis 12. Dezember 2019 zentral an der Messe Frankfurt statt. Die Teilnehmer erwartet ein breites Spektrum an aktuellen IT-Themen.
